ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A collection of several utility functions related to binary incomplete block designs. The package contains function to generate A- and D-efficient binary incomplete block designs with given numbers of treatments, number of blocks and block size. The package also contains function to generate an incomplete block design with specified concurrence matrix. There are functions to generate balanced treatment incomplete block designs and incomplete block designs for test versus control treatments comparisons with specified concurrence matrix. Package also allows performing analysis of variance of data and computing estimated marginal means of factors from experiments using a connected incomplete block design. Tests of hypothesis of treatment contrasts in incomplete block design set up is supported.

A collection of several utility functions related to binary incomplete block designs. The package contains function to generate A- and D-efficient binary incomplete block designs with given numbers of treatments, number of blocks and block size. The package also contains function to generate an incomplete block design with specified concurrence matrix. There are functions to generate balanced treatment incomplete block designs and incomplete block designs for test versus control treatments comparisons with specified concurrence matrix. Package also allows performing analysis of variance of data and computing estimated marginal means of factors from experiments using a connected incomplete block design. Tests of hypothesis of treatment contrasts in incomplete block design set up is supported.

name: r-ibd
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.6" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ibd
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ibd_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ibd/ibd_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ed3ce2496ee9520fc05fb64bb801668c65ead3b41cb68fce5bce019e54c20e84

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-car
    - r-emmeans
    - r-lpsolve
    - r-multcomp
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-car
    - r-emmeans
    - r-lpsolve
    - r-multcomp

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ibd')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ibd')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ibd
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: 'A collection of several utility functions related to binary incomplete block designs. The package contains function to generate A- and D-efficient binary incomplete block designs with given numbers of treatments, number of blocks and block size. The package also contains function to generate an incomplete block
    design with specified concurrence matrix. There are functions to generate balanced treatment incomplete block designs and incomplete block designs for test versus control treatments comparisons with specified concurrence matrix. Package also allows performing analysis of variance of data and computing estimated marginal
    means of factors from experiments using a connected incomplete block design. Tests of hypothesis of treatment contrasts in incomplete block design set up is supported. '
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: ibd
# Version: 1.5
# Date: 2019-04-24
# Title: Incomplete Block Designs
# Authors@R: c(person("B N", "Mandal", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "mandal.stat@gmail.com"))
# Author: B N Mandal [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: B N Mandal <mandal.stat@gmail.com>
# Depends: R (>= 3.1.1)
# Imports: lpSolve, car, emmeans, multcomp
# Suggests: multcompView
# Description: A collection of several utility functions related to binary incomplete block designs. The package contains function to generate A- and D-efficient binary incomplete block designs with given numbers of treatments, number of blocks and block size. The package also contains function to generate an incomplete block design with specified concurrence matrix. There are functions to generate balanced treatment incomplete block designs and incomplete block designs for test versus control treatments comparisons with specified concurrence matrix. Package also allows performing analysis of variance of data and computing estimated marginal means of factors from experiments using a connected incomplete block design. Tests of hypothesis of treatment contrasts in incomplete block design set up is supported.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-04-24 06:06:05 UTC; b
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-04-24 07:10:03 UTC
